snippet: The Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center continued its holiday tradition with a different player taking the lead in almost each work.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance of Bach’s Brandenburg Concertos by Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center continued its holiday tradition with a different player taking the lead in almost each work.

headline.main: Review: Bach’s Brandenburg Concertos at Alice Tully Hall
